name: NPR
text:
The white St. Louis couple who face felony charges for waving firearms at Black Lives Matter protesters outside their home in June will speak at the RNC next week, their lawyers confirmed to NPR.
https://t.co/bkjGIhNkq3

name: NPR
text:
JUST IN: Mali's President Ibrahim Boubacar Keita has announced his resignation, just hours after soldiers carried out a mutiny. The soldiers reportedly had detained Keita after surrounding his residence.
https://t.co/LzLG9zkt22

text:
Homeland Security says the findings of a government watchdog report, which concluded that the department's acting leadership was not legitimately appointed, are "baseless and baffling."
